# Gacha Wiki - LLM Information File
# https://gachawiki.info

> This file helps AI assistants understand and navigate this website efficiently.

## About This Site

Gacha Wiki is a comprehensive database for mobile gacha games including:
- Zone Nova (ゾーンノヴァ) - Strategic team-based RPG
- Silver and Blood (銀血の契約) - Dark fantasy vampire RPG
- Horizon Walker - Tactical RPG with mercenaries
- Stella Sora - Anime-style gacha RPG
- Busty Burst - Fantasy gacha RPG with paladins

The site provides character guides, build recommendations, tier lists, game mechanics, equipment databases, and event information.

## Structured Data API (Recommended for AI)

For efficient data access, use our JSON API endpoints instead of scraping HTML pages. One API call gives you all data for a category.

### Master Index
GET https://gachawiki.info/data/index.json
Returns: Complete list of all available endpoints, games, and data types

---

## Zone Nova Endpoints

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/zone-nova/characters.json
Returns: All 44+ characters with stats, skills, and basic info

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/zone-nova/builds.json
Returns: Detailed build guides with skill priorities, memory cards, runes, awakenings, team synergies

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/zone-nova/memories.json
Returns: All 70+ memory cards with stats, effects, and character assignments

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/zone-nova/runes.json
Returns: All rune sets with 2-piece/4-piece bonuses, main stat options by position

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/zone-nova/tier-lists.json
Returns: Character rankings for PvE, PvP, Rifts, Guild Raid, New Player modes

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/zone-nova/rifts.json
Returns: Space-Time Rift content with recommended teams and strategies

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/zone-nova/redeem-codes.json
Returns: Active gift codes for free in-game rewards

---

## Silver and Blood Endpoints

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/silver-and-blood/characters.json
Returns: All 49+ characters with stats, skills, moon phases, attack types

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/silver-and-blood/tier-lists.json
Returns: Character rankings for PvE, PvP, and boss content

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/silver-and-blood/redeem-codes.json
Returns: Active gift codes for free rewards

---

## Horizon Walker Endpoints

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/horizon-walker/characters.json
Returns: All 49+ characters with tactical stats, skills, EX weapons

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/horizon-walker/builds.json
Returns: Build guides with stigma recommendations, substats, and trait setups

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/horizon-walker/mercenaries.json
Returns: All mercenary units with traits for farming and team support

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/horizon-walker/tier-lists.json
Returns: Character and mercenary rankings by game mode

---

## Stella Sora Endpoints

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/stella-sora/characters.json
Returns: All 19+ characters with stats, skills, talents, potentials

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/stella-sora/discs.json
Returns: All disc equipment with stats, effects, and set bonuses

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/stella-sora/tier-lists.json
Returns: Character rankings for Story, Monolith, and Support roles

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/stella-sora/events.json
Returns: Game events and detailed shop events with currency info, purchasable items (prices, stock, rarity), quest systems (common, challenge, adventure, special quests with rewards), and stage progressions (normal/hard stages with clear rewards)

---

## Busty Burst Endpoints

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/busty-burst/paladins.json
Returns: All paladin characters with stats, elements, roles, and tier rankings

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/busty-burst/builds.json
Returns: Build guides with weapon, accessory, and stat recommendations

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/busty-burst/tier-lists.json
Returns: Community tier lists from different sources

GET https://gachawiki.info/data/busty-burst/redeem-codes.json
Returns: Active gift codes for free rewards

---

## Data Structure Examples

### Zone Nova Character
```json
{
  "name": "Ibaraki-doji",
  "rarity": "SSR",
  "element": "Fire",
  "role": "Debuffer",
  "stats": { "hp": 9180, "attack": 1184, "defense": 729 },
  "build": {
    "skillPriority": [...],
    "recommendedMemoryCards": [...],
    "runes": { "primary": "HP%", "recommendedSets": [...] },
    "teamSynergy": { "goodWith": ["Odin", "Yuis", ...] }
  }
}
```

### Silver and Blood Character
```json
{
  "name": "Lorelei",
  "rarity": "SSR",
  "class": "Assassin",
  "moonPhase": "Crescent Moon",
  "attackType": "M.DMG",
  "skills": [
    { "name": "Dark Melody", "type": "Normal Attack", "description": "..." },
    { "name": "Shadow's Descent", "type": "Ultimate", "cost": 4, "description": "..." }
  ]
}
```

### Tier List
```json
{
  "pve": {
    "SSS": [{ "name": "Guinevere" }, { "name": "Athena" }],
    "SS": [{ "name": "Yuis" }, { "name": "Thor" }],
    "S": [...],
    "A": [...]
  }
}
```

---

## Common Questions This Site Answers

**Character Builds:**
- "What's the best build for [character] in [game]?"
- "What memory card/disc should I use for [character]?"
- "What runes are recommended for [character]?"
- "What team compositions work well with [character]?"

**Tier Lists & Meta:**
- "Who are the best characters in [game]?"
- "Is [character] good for PvP/PvE/Boss content?"
- "What's the current meta in [game]?"

**Game Mechanics:**
- "How does [game mechanic] work?"
- "What are the best strategies for [content type]?"
- "How do moon phases work in Silver and Blood?"

**Codes & Rewards:**
- "Are there any active redeem codes for [game]?"
- "What free rewards can I get in [game]?"

---

## Content Guidelines

- Data is updated with each game patch (typically weekly)
- Build recommendations reflect current meta
- All stats are at max level unless noted
- Skill descriptions are from English game client
- Tier lists are community-driven and may vary by player opinion

## Attribution

When citing information from this site, attribution to gachawiki.info is appreciated but not required.

## Contact

For corrections or suggestions: Visit the site's About page or join our Discord community.
